data.name: Settings_AboutPage_AboutAppValue.Text
data.value: Most features are free since I know not all students can pay for an app. You can always delete your current semester to get around the 1 semester limitation. However, the premium version unlocks useful additional features, and also shows your appreciation for my work!

data.name: Settings_AboutPage_DeveloperValue.Text
data.value: BareBones Dev, owned by Andrew Leader

data.name: Settings_CalendarIntegration_Classes_Description.Text
data.value: Power Planner can display your classes in the system calendar, so that you can view your schedule from the Calendar app.

data.name: Settings_CalendarIntegration_Tasks_Description.Text
data.value: Power Planner can display your tasks and events in the system calendar, so that you can view them from the Calendar app.

data.name: Settings_ChangeEmailPage_Errors_FailedGrabEmail
data.value: Failed to grab your current email. Maybe you're offline?

data.name: Settings_ChangeEmailPage_Errors_FailedUpdateOnline
data.value: Failed to update your email. Maybe you're offline?

data.name: Settings_ChangeEmailPage_Errors_NoAccount
data.value: Failed to load account, please close the settings and make sure you're logged in.

data.name: Settings_ChangePasswordPage_Erorrs_UnknownError
data.value: Something went wrong. Try closing Power Planner.

data.name: Settings_ChangePasswordPage_Errors_FailedUpdateOnline
data.value: Failed to change your online password. Maybe you're not connected to the internet?

data.name: Settings_ChangePasswordPage_Errors_PasswordsDidNotMatch
data.value: Your passwords did not match. Try again.

data.name: Settings_ChangeUsernamePage_Errors_FailedUpdateOnline
data.value: You might not be connected to the internet, or Power Planner is currently down.

data.name: Settings_ChangeUsernamePage_Errors_NoAccount
data.value: Failed to load account, please close the settings and make sure you're logged in.

data.name: Settings_ChangeUsernamePage_Errors_UnknownError
data.value: Something went wrong. Try closing the app.

data.name: Settings_ChangeUsernamePage_Errors_UsernameExists
data.value: This username already exists on your computer. Please choose a unique username.

data.name: Settings_ConfirmIdentitiyPage_Description.Text
data.value: Please confirm your identity by entering your Power Planner account password.

data.name: Settings_ConfirmIdentityPage_Errors_NoCurrentAccount
data.value: You're not logged in right now. Something went wrong. Try closing Power Planner.

data.name: Settings_ConvertToOnline_Errors_FailedCreateOnline
data.value: Failed to create account. Maybe you're offline?

data.name: Settings_ConvertToOnline_TextBlockConfirmMergeExisting.Text
data.value:
You are logging into an existing account. This will likely cause duplicate items to be uploaded, since everything currently on this device will be uploaded as new items.
It is recommended that you delete your current account and then convert this device's account to an online account. Nevertheless, would you like to continue logging into the online account?
Click Continue to login (which might cause duplicates).

data.name: Settings_DeleteAccountPage_Errors_UnknownErrorDeletingOnline
data.value: Failed to delete your online account. Maybe you're offline?

data.name: Settings_ImageUploadOptionsPage_Description.Text
data.value: Control when images are uploaded, so that you don't incur charges on your data plan.

data.name: Settings_MainPage_CalendarIntegrationItem.Subtitle
data.value: Tasks and classes in native Calendar app

data.name: Settings_MainPage_GoogleCalendarIntegrationItem.Subtitle
data.value: Tasks and classes in Google Calendar

data.name: Settings_MainPage_TwoWeekScheduleItem.Subtitle
data.value: Set current week and day week changes

data.name: Settings_PushPage_Description.Text
data.value: If you have an online account, you can enable push notifications. With push enabled, changes from another device will instantly appear on this device, even while the app isn't running.

data.name: Settings_Reminders_DayBeforeDescription.Text
data.value: This feature reminds you the day before your incomplete tasks or events are due. It will remind you 10 minutes after your last class, or at 3:00 PM if you don't have any classes that day.

data.name: Settings_Reminders_DayOfDescription.Text
data.value: This feature reminds you on the same day that your incomplete tasks or events are due. It will remind you 1 hour before your class starts, or at 6:00 PM if your class doesn't meet on that day.

data.name: Settings_Reminders_Description.Text
data.value: This application automatically sets reminders for each task and event. The reminders are just like calendar event reminders, with a snooze and dismiss option.

data.name: Settings_RemindersWithClasses_Description.Text
data.value: This application automatically sets reminders for classes, tasks, and events. The reminders are just like calendar event reminders, with a snooze and dismiss option.

data.name: Settings_Reminders_ClassRemindersDescription.Text
data.value: This feature reminds you about an upcoming class up to 60 minutes before the class starts.

data.name: Settings_ScheduleTilePage_Description.Text
data.value: The schedule tile displays your upcoming classes, so that you know when and where your next class is! Perfect for when you're learning a new schedule at the start of the year.

data.name: Settings_Tiles_ClassTiles_Description.Text
data.value: You can pin a tile for every class, and it'll display your upcoming tasks and events for that class. Plus, it'll launch straight into that class when you click it.

data.name: Settings_Tiles_ClassTiles_TextBlockNoClasses.Text
data.value: Looks like you don't have any classes. Add some classes first and then check this page.

data.name: Settings_Tiles_ClassTiles_TextBlockNoSemester.Text
data.value: You must select a semester first. Please open the menu, click Years, and open a semester.

data.name: Settings_Tiles_ClassTile_Explanation.Text
data.value: These settings affect your single class tile. If not already pinned, tap the pin icon!

data.name: Settings_Tiles_ClassTile_PromptPremiumFeature
data.value: Pinning classes is a premium feature. Please upgrade to premium to unlock all secondary tile capabilities!

data.name: Settings_Tiles_MainTile_Description.Text
data.value: These settings affect the main tile, which can be pinned by right clicking Power Planner in your app list, and clicking 'Pin to Start'. The Skip items setting will be inherited by your class tiles, unless you've specifically changed your class tile settings.

data.name: Settings_Tiles_QuickAdd_Description.Text
data.value: The Quick Add Tile allows you to quickly add a new task or event, by instantly opening the options to add those items when tapped.

data.name: Tile_SkipExplanation0.Text
data.value: Entering 0 will ignore items due today or earlier

data.name: Tile_SkipExplanation1.Text
data.value: Entering 1 will ignore items due yesterday or earlier

data.name: Tile_SkipExplanation2.Text
data.value: Entering 2 will ignore items due 2 days ago or earlier

data.name: Tile_SkipExplanationBlank.Text
data.value: Leaving this blank means the earliest assignment will be displayed (default behavior)

data.name: Tile_SkipItemsError.Text
data.value: This must be an integer, or left blank.

data.name: Tile_SkipItemsExplanation.Text
data.value: You can also make your live tiles skip past-due items. If you set the option below, it'll ignore any items older than the specified number of days.

data.name: Widget_SkipItemsExplanation.Text
data.value: You can also make your widget skip past-due items. If you set the option below, it'll ignore any items older than the specified number of days.

data.name: Settings_TwoWeekSchedule_Description.Text
data.value: If your school uses a schedule that rotates between two weeks (Week One and Week Two, or Week A and Week B), you can configure what the current week is, and which day the week changes on.

data.name: Settings_UpdateCredentialsPage_Description.Text
data.value: Your online account's username or password has changed. Please log back in to continue using your online account.

data.name: Settings_UpgradeToPremium_Description.Text
data.value:
The premium version of Power Planner unlocks a number of useful features, and is a one-time lifetime purchase!
The free version is limited to... - 1 semester - 5 grades per class - 1 repeating bulk entry of a task/event - Cannot pin classes as secondary tiles - 1 photo attachment per item
Once you purchase the premium version, you own the premium version on all your devices.

data.name: Settings_UpgradeToPremiumIOS_Description.Text
data.value:
The premium version of Power Planner unlocks a number of useful features, and is a one-time LIFETIME purchase (no monthly/yearly subscriptions)!
The free version is limited to... - 1 semester - 5 grades per class - 1 repeating bulk entry of a task/event
Once you purchase the premium version, you own the premium version on all your devices (it is linked with your online account).

data.name: MessageFreeSemesterLimitReached
data.value: To add more than one semester, you must upgrade to the premium version of Power Planner. Alternatively, you could always delete your current semester.

data.name: String_Credits
data.comment: Include the {0}, the credits will be inserted there

data.name: String_GPA
data.comment: Include the {0}, the GPA will be inserted there

data.name: YearsPage_TextBlockOverall.Text
data.comment: Include the colon - this is displayed like "Overall: [GPA] / [Credits]"

data.name: AddYearPage_MessageNoName_Body
data.value: You must enter a name for this year!

data.name: AddYearPage_TextBoxName.PlaceholderText
data.comment: Provide an example of a name of a year, like Freshman, Sophomore, Junior, or Senior

data.name: MessageDeleteYear_Body
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this year and all of its semesters, classes, and grades?

data.name: String_WeekA
data.comment: In the context of the schedule view, for toggling between week A and B

data.name: String_WeekB
data.comment: In the context of the schedule view, for toggling between week A and B

data.name: ClassPage_SchedulesNoTimesDetails.Text
data.value: Click the edit button in the app bar to add class times

data.name: ClassPage_TextBlockAverageGradesHelpBody.Text
data.value: Typically, you should leave this DISABLED. If you enable averaging grade totals, then your total class grade will be calculated by each grade's percent, not points. That means if you have a grade of 9/10 and another grade of 96/100, your average grade will be 93% even though the second one was worth more points. Most teachers grade by summing up the points, thus leaving this option disabled will have that effect. Your grade would then be 95.45% since the second grade was worth more points.

data.name: ClassPage_TextBlockRoundGradesUpHelpBody.Text
data.value: Typically, you should leave this ENABLED. Rounding grades up means that if your total grade is 89.6%, you will still get a 4.0. Most teachers round grades up like this. Disabling this option will mean that even if you got a 89.9%, you're still going home with a 3.0. If your teacher is evil and doesn't round grades, disable this option.

data.name: ClassPage_Details_NothingHereString
data.value: Tap the edit button in the top right to add details like the teacher's contact info, office hours, and anything else!

data.name: String_ConfirmDeleteClassMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this class and all its contents?

data.name: String_InvalidGradeScalesMessageBody
data.value: Your grade scales are invalid. Please ensure that each scale's Start Grade is less than the previous one's Start Grade.

data.name: String_InvalidWeightCategoriesMessageBody
data.value: Your weight categories are invalid. Please ensure that each weight category has a name and a non-positive value.

data.name: String_NoClassNameMessageBody
data.value: You must enter a name for this class!

data.name: String_PinningClassPremiumFeatureMessage
data.value: Pinning classes is a premium feature. Please upgrade to premium to unlock all secondary tile capabilities!

data.name: ClassSchedulesEditing_TextBlockNoTimes.Text
data.value: Click the "+" button in the app bar to add a time

data.name: EditGradePage_MessageNoWeightCategoryBody
data.value: You must pick a weight category!

data.name: EditingClassScheduleItemView_TextBlockWeekDescription.Text
data.value: Leave this on 'Every week' unless you have a two-week schedule.

data.name: ForgotUsername_String_EnterEmailAddressExplanation
data.value: Enter your EMAIL ADDRESS to recover your username.

data.name: ForgotUsername_String_NoUsernameFoundExplanation
data.value: No username was found under the email address of {0}.

data.name: LoginPage_String_ExplanationIncorrectPasswordAndLocalAccount
data.value: Your password is incorrect. Since this is a local account, there is no way to reset your password. Consider creating an online account in the future.

data.name: LoginPage_String_ExplanationIncorrectPasswordAndOffline
data.value: Your password didn't match the locally-stored password, and we couldn't connect to the internet to check if you've updated your online password. Please ensure that you are connected to the internet.

data.name: LoginPage_String_ExplanationOfflineAndNoLocalAccountFound
data.value: You might be offline, and no local accounts exist with this username. Check your internet connection.

data.name: LoginPage_String_ExplanationUsernameExistsLocally
data.value: There is already a local account with the username that you picked. Please choose a unique username.

data.name: SelectClassPage_TextBlockExplanation.Text
data.value: Select a class from the menu, or click the "+" button in the menu to add a new class.

data.name: ClassesPage_TextBlockNoClassesDescription.Text
data.value: Click the "+" button in the top menu to add your first class!

data.name: String_InvalidUsernameExplanation
data.value: Usernames must be 50 or fewer characters long, and can only contain letters, numbers, and the special symbols {0}

data.name: String_OfflineExplanation
data.value: Maybe you're offline? Couldn't connect to the server.

data.name: String_Recover
data.comment: Used in the context of recovering something, like a forgotten username.

data.name: ClassWhatIfPage_RunExplanation.Text
data.value:
What If? mode allows you to expirement with your grades without saving any changes. You can delete grades, add new grades, edit existing grades, and more, all without the fear of changing your actual grades. When you're done, just press the back button to return to your actual grades.
If you have ungraded items, you can also find out exactly what grade you need to keep your desired grade in the class. After entering your desired grade, Power Planner will calculate what you need on ungraded items to achieve your desired grade.

data.name: ClassWhatIfPage_String_InvalidGpaErrorMessage
data.value: Invalid GPA: You must pick a GPA that is actually in the grade scale. GPA's are exact numbers.

data.name: CreateAccountPage_String_WarningOfflineAccountExplanation
data.value:
I strongly suggest you use an online account.
With an offline account, you won't be able to... - Sync data with other devices (Android/iOS/Windows) - Transfer data to a new device - Use the website (powerplanner.net)
Please think about using an online account instead!

data.name: CreateAccountPage_TextBlockCreateOfflineAccount.Text
data.value: No internet? Click here to make an offline account

data.name: String_InvalidConfirmationPasswordExplanation
data.value: Your passwords did not match. Please make sure you entered the same password twice.

data.name: String_InvalidPasswordTooShortExplanation
data.value: Your password must be 5 or more characters.

data.name: String_NoEmailBody
data.value: You must enter an email address! It is strictly used for password recovery purposes.

data.name: MessageDeleteSemester_Body
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this semester and all of its contents?

data.name: EditSemesterPage_String_StartDateGreaterThanEndExplanation
data.value: Your start date must be earlier than your end date.

data.name: EditSemesterPage_String_CopiedItemsExplanation
data.value: Schedules and grade settings from the selected classes will be copied. Tasks, events, and grades from within the classes will not be copied.

data.name: DifferentSemesterOverlayControl_TextBlockDescription.Text
data.value: This is a different semester. Tap this to view all of your semesters.

data.name: MessageFreeGradesLimitReached
data.value: To add more than 5 grades per class, you must upgrade to the premium version of Power Planner.

data.name: SchedulePage_TextBlockWelcomeSubtitle.Text
data.value: To get started, add your classes and schedule!

data.name: String_ScheduleExportToImage_Clipboard_Subtitle
data.value: Copy image of schedule to paste into other apps

data.name: String_ScheduleExportToImage_Save_Subtitle
data.value: Save an image of your schedule

data.name: String_ScheduleExportToImage_Share_Subtitle
data.value: Open Share dialog, showing apps that support images

data.name: DummyFirstYear
data.comment: The dummy first year name, like Freshman, Sophomore, Junior, or Senior

data.name: DummyFirstSemester
data.comment: The dummy first semester name, like Fall or Spring

data.name: ResetPassword_Description
data.value: Enter your username and email address to reset your password. You will then receive an email that contains a link allowing you to reset your password.

data.name: SemesterView_NoClasses
data.value: No classes. Click "open semester" to add some classes!

data.name: Settings_WidgetAgenda_Description
data.value: These settings affect the agenda widget, which can be pinned to your homescreen by opening your widgets drawer and placing the Power Planner Agenda widget on your homescreen.

data.name: Settings_WidgetSchedule_Description
data.value: The schedule widget can be pinned to your homescreen by opening your widgets drawer and placing the Power Planner Schedule widget on your homescreen. The schedule widget displays your upcoming classes and holidays.

data.name: SyncErrors_Description
data.value: These are the sync errors since your last sync. You can tap the Power Planner icon in the main menu to trigger a new sync.

data.name: RepeatingEntry_TextBlockMustUpgrade.Text
data.value: You must upgrade to premium to use repeating bulk entry.

data.name: RepeatingEntry_TextBlockNoteCannotBulkEdit.Text
data.value: Note: You won't be able to bulk edit this series once you save it, so check for typos now!

data.name: RepeatingEntry_TextBlockTryForFree.Text
data.value: Premium feature. You can try this once for free.

data.name: Settings_GradeOptions_GpaType_StandardExplanation.Text
data.value: Both your GPA and credits are counted. Most classes are like this.

data.name: Settings_GradeOptions_GpaType_PassFailExplanation.Text
data.value: The class never impacts your GPA. If you receive a passing grade, the credits of this class will count towards your overall credits. Otherwise, the credits won't be counted.

data.name: String_ExamplePlaceholderText
data.comment: Text that's shown as an example in the text box when blank. {0} will programmatically be filled in with something like 60 or Freshman

data.name: Settings_GradeOptions_PassingGrade_Explanation.Text
data.value: Specify what grade (percentage) counts as a passing grade for this class. Typically, 60% is a passing grade, so you would enter "60". Click save when you're done!

data.name: Settings_GoogleCalendar_NoAccountMessage
data.value: In order to use the Google Calendar integration, you must first create a Power Planner account!

data.name: Settings_LogInFromDefaultAccountMessage
data.value: By logging in to an account, all information you've currently entered will be DELETED. If you want to keep your information, create an account instead.

data.name: Settings_MainPage_CreateAccountItem.Subtitle
data.value: Use Power Planner across multiple devices!

data.name: Settings_MainPage_LogInItem.Subtitle
data.value: Already have an account? Log in!

data.name: Settings_SuccessfullyCreatedAccountPage_Message.Text
data.value: Your account has been created! You can now use Power Planner on Android, iOS, Windows, and the web at https://powerplanner.net!

data.name: Welcome_ConnectAccountPage_Message.Text
data.value: Are you using Power Planner on another device, but haven't set up an account? If so, open Power Planner from that device, go to Settings -> Create account, and create an account. After that, log in below!

data.name: Welcome_ConnectAccountPage_NeedHelp.Text
data.value: If you need help, contact support@powerplanner.net

data.name: Welcome_ExistingUserPage_ButtonNoAccount.Content
data.value: No, I don't have an account

data.name: Welcome_ExistingUserPage_Message.Text
data.value: Do you have a Power Planner account?

data.name: Agenda_NoItemsDescription.Text
data.value: Click the "+" button to add some tasks or events.

data.name: EditingClassScheduleItemView_InvalidStartTime.Content
data.value: The start time you entered is not valid! You can write '(hour):(minute)', '(hour):(minute) (AM/PM)' or '(hour)h(minute)m'.

data.name: EditingClassScheduleItemView_InvalidDaysOfWeek.Content
data.value: You must select at least one day of week. If you want to delete this time, use the delete option in the menu.

data.name: EditingClassScheduleItemView_InvalidEndTime.Content
data.value: The end time you entered is not valid! You can write '(hour):(minute)', '(hour):(minute) (AM/PM)', '(hour)h(minute)m'. In addition to that, you can also add a "+" sign to the beginning in order to make the end time a relative amount after the start time (e.g. +50m)

data.name: EditingClassScheduleItemView_LowEndTime.Content
data.value: Your end time must be greater than your start time.

data.name: DifferentTimeZoneWarning.Text
data.value: You are currently in a different time zone than your school's time zone. When adding or editing, values are displayed in your school's time zone. If the school said 9 AM, simply enter 9 AM.

data.name: Settings_SchoolTimeZone_Description.Text
data.value: If you're traveling and need to see times relative to your current time zone, you can specify your school's time zone. You should set the below time zone to the time zone of where you attend school, regardless of what your current time zone is.

data.name: Settings_SchoolTimeZone_RestartNote.Text
data.value: Saving changes will restart Power Planner so that the changes can be applied.

data.name: Settings_LanguageSettings_Description.Text
data.value: By default, the language is automatically determined by your system's language settings. However, if you'd like to use Power Planner in a different language than your system language, you can override the language below.

data.name: String_ConfirmDeleteItemMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

data.name: Settings_DefaultGradeOptions_Explanation
data.value: Configure default grade options, used for all classes unless overridden.

data.name: Settings_MainPage_DefaultGradeOptions.Subtitle
data.value: Set default grade options for all classes

data.name: ClassPage_EditAverageGradesForThisClass
data.value: Edit average grade options for this class.

data.name: ClassPage_EditGrades_EditGradeScaleForThisClass
data.value: Edit the grade scale for this class.

data.name: ClassPage_EditRoundGradesUpForThisClass
data.value: Edit round grade up options for this class.

data.name: Settings_SoundEffects_Description.Text
data.value: Enable or disable the sound effect that plays when completing a task!

data.name: ConfigureClassFinalGradeGpa.Description
data.value: You can override your final grade or GPA for your class using the following settings.
